# ç”¨Pythonå¤‡ä»½ä½ çš„å…³æ³¨åˆ—è¡¨ ## ä½¿ç”¨æ–¹æ³• * å®‰è£…requestsåº“ï¼š`pip install requests`æˆ–`python -m pip install requests` * å¤åˆ¶å¹¶è¿è¡Œä»¥ä¸‹ä»£ç ï¼ŒæŒ‰ç…§æç¤ºè¾“å…¥ä½ çš„tokenã€‚ * ç»“æœå°†å‚¨å­˜åœ¨`result.html`ï¼Œå¸–å­æ•°æ®å‚¨å­˜åœ¨`posts/`ç›®å½•ä¸‹ ```python import requests import json import time import pathlib from pathlib import Path SLEEP_TIME = 2.0 headers = {'token': ''} def get_attention_list_by_page(page_id): print('get attention list: page:', page_id) url = 'https://tapi.thuhole.com/v3/contents/post/attentions' params = { 'page': page_id, 'device': 0, 'v': 'v3.0.6-455336' } req = requests.get(url=url, headers=headers, params=params) time.sleep(SLEEP_TIME) if (req.status_code != 200): print(' Error code:', req.status_code) return get_attention_list_by_page(page_id) else: print(' Success.') content = json.loads(req.text) return list(content['comments'].keys()) def get_attention_list(): page_id = 1 attention_list = [] while True: attention_list_page = get_attention_list_by_page(page_id) if len(attention_list_page) == 0: break attention_list += attention_list_page page_id = page_id + 1 return list(map(lambda x: int(x), attention_list)) def get_post(post_id): print('get post:', post_id) url = 'https://tapi.thuhole.com/v3/contents/post/detail' params = { 'pid': post_id, 'device': 0, 'v': 'v3.0.6-455336' } req = requests.get(url=url, headers=headers, params=params) time.sleep(SLEEP_TIME) if (req.status_code != 200): print(' Error code:', req.status_code) return get_post(page_id) else: print(' Success.') content = json.loads(req.text) post = content['post']['text'] reply = list(map(lambda x: (x['name'], x['text']), content['data'])) return post, reply def dump_all_posts(pid_list): Path('posts/').mkdir(exist_ok=True) for post_id in pid_list: post, reply = get_post(post_id) with open('posts/{}.json'.format(post_id), 'w') as f: json.dump({'post': post, 'reply': reply}, f) def dump_as_html(): post_list = list(Path('posts').glob('*.json')) post_list = sorted(post_list, key=lambda x:int(x.stem), reverse=True) result_html = '' for post_path in post_list: with open(post_path) as f: post = json.load(f) result_html += f'

{post_path.stem}

' result_html += post['post'] result_html += '
    ' for name, reply in post['reply']: result_html += f'
  • [{name}] {reply}
    • ' result_html += '
' with open('result.html', 'w', encoding='utf-8') as f: f.write(result_html) if __name__ == '__main__': headers['token'] = input('Please enter token:') attention_list = get_attention_list() dump_all_posts(attention_list) dump_as_html() ```
